metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8859 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to create a denial-of-service condition on affected installations of ELOG Electronic Logbook 3.1.4-283534d. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability. The specific flaw exists within the processing of HTTP parameters. A crafted request can trigger the dereference of a null pointer. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to create a denial-of-service condition. Was ZDI-CAN-10115.

criterions.comment: elog package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
